import React from "react"; import classes from "./MovieDetail.module.css" const MovieDetail = (props) =>{ const imageUrl = `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500${props.movie.backdrop_path}` return (

{props.movie.name}

Release Date: {props.movie.first_air_date}

Voted: {props.movie.vote_average}/10

{props.movie.overview}

) } export default MovieDetail
